events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but it doesn't fit me well. I would like to know how I can get a refund for the item.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request due to product not fitting.
Assigning this refund case to the returns department for further processing.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like a refund for your jacket. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and verify the condition of the jacket to proceed with the refund?
My order number is 987654321. The jacket is unused and still has the original tags attached.
We have processed your refund request. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid shipping label we will email to you shortly.
Thank you for the quick assistance. I appreciate the prepaid label and the clear instructions.
Your refund case has been successfully initiated and the shipping label sent to your email. Once we receive the jacket, refund will be processed promptly.
Just following up to ensure you received the prepaid label and if you need any further assistance with your refund process.
Yes, I received the label and have already sent the jacket back. Thanks again for your help!
We have received the returned jacket and completed your refund. The amount should appear on your original payment method shortly.
Your refund case has been officially closed. Please contact us anytime if you have other questions.
We have sent a short survey to rate your customer support experience. Your feedback is appreciated.
